items.sentence: Tom will never understand why we want him to do this.
Tom will probably ask Mary for permission to do that.
My mother doesn\'t want me to go skating on the pond.
Tom told everybody that he wanted to become a barber.
Tom didn\'t mean to tell Mary the secret, but he did.
Tom didn\'t say whether he was planning to go or not.
When I use contacts, my eyes feel dry and become red.
Is Tom better at speaking French or speaking English?
Is it a crime to encourage someone to commit suicide?
Is it true that Mary sold her wedding dress to Alice?
